screen.itemmodelfix.config.title: Item Model Fix Configuration
option.itemmodelfix.generation_type.vani:
Performance impact: §b§lnone§r
Uses Vanilla model generation.
option.itemmodelfix.generation_type.unle:
Performance impact: §b§lnone§r
Uses Vanilla model generation, but
applies some math to make it look correct.
May cause flickering along model edges.
option.itemmodelfix.generation_type.outl:
Performance impact: §b§lnone§r
Same as Unlerp mode, but uses a
different generation algorithm to
prevent enchantment glint flickering.
option.itemmodelfix.generation_type.pixe:
Performance impact: §b§lnone§r-§a§llow§r
Generates all pixels individually. Provides
best results but causes a larger impact
with higher resolution resource packs.
